name: Customer feedback survey questions
description: Creating email surveys to gather valuable feedback from your customers.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Create an email survey for {{company_name}} to get feedback from customers about their satisfaction with [product/service] {{Product_service}} . Include 10-15 {{format}} questions that can help the company understand customer preferences and experiences.
Example: 
Subject: {{subject}} Customer Satisfaction Survey for [Company Name]
Dear Valued Customer,
At [Company Name], we are committed to providing exceptional products and services to meet your needs. Your feedback is essential to help us continually improve and enhance your experience. We kindly ask you to take a few minutes to complete this survey to share your thoughts and opinions with us.
Your responses will be kept confidential and will only be used for the purpose of improving our products and services. Thank you for your valuable input in advance!
Please rate the following questions on a scale of 1 to 5 (1 being strongly disagree and 5 being strongly agree):
How satisfied are you with the overall quality of [product/service]?
How likely are you to recommend [Company Name] to a friend or colleague?
How would you rate the customer service you received while interacting with [Company Name]?
How easy was it to navigate and use our [product/service]?
How well does [product/service] meet your needs and expectations?
How would you rate the value for money of our [product/service]?
How frequently do you use [product/service]?
How would you rate the ordering/purchasing process of [product/service]?
How likely are you to purchase from [Company Name] again in the future?
How satisfied are you with the delivery/shipping process of [product/service]?
How do you feel about the variety of products/services offered by [Company Name]?
How responsive do you find [Company Name] to your inquiries or issues?
How likely are you to engage with [Company Name] on social media platforms?
How well does [Company Name] communicate product/service updates and promotions with you?
How likely are you to participate in future surveys or feedback sessions with [Company Name]?
Open-Ended Questions:
What do you like most about [product/service]?
What improvements would you like to see in [product/service]?
How can we better meet your needs and expectations?
Have you encountered any challenges or issues while using [product/service]? If yes, please elaborate.
Is there anything else you would like to share with us about your experience with [Company Name]?
Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey and for your continued support of [Company Name].
Warm regards,
[Your Name] {{Your_name}} 
[Your Position] {{job_title}} 
[Company Name] {{company_name}}

format.title: Question format
format.description: (e.g., multiple choice, rating scale, open ended)

subject.title: Subject Line
subject.description: Craft a clear and concise subject line to grab your customers' attention

ui_metadata.value: Your Feedback Helps Us Grow! Share Your Thoughts

Your_name.title: Your name
Your_name.description: Optional, but recommended to personalize the email

job_title.title: Your job title within the company
job_title.description: Optional, but recommended to add credibility
